title: Insurers Sink on US Plan to Keep Medicare Payment Rates Flat
description: Shares of major US insurers tumbled after the US proposed holding payments to private Medicare plans flat next year, a huge disappointment for investors.
content: Shares of major US insurers tumbled after the US proposed holding payments to private Medicare plans flat next year, a huge disappointment for investors.
